name: Solar Rebate Program
description: $500 rebate for city residents to install solar; can combine with federal tax credits
fullDescription: The City of Redwood City offers rebates for residents installing solar panels, helping reduce electricity costs and promote renewable energy.
whatTheyOffer:
- $500 rebate for solar installation
- For Redwood City residents only
- Can combine with federal 30% tax credit
- Can combine with utility incentives
- Reduces electricity bills
- Increases home value
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Redwood City resident
2. Install qualifying solar PV system
3. Use licensed solar installer
4. Apply through City of Redwood City website
5. Submit proof of installation
6. Receive rebate check
keywords: Redwood City, solar, solar panels, PV system, $500, renewable energy, federal tax credit, rebate
